amendment.description: to express the sense of the Senate regarding compensation for exposure to toxic substances at Department of Energy facilities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2847 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2847 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR 3/12/2004 S2674-2675; text: CR 3/12/2004 S2674) to express the sense of the Senate regarding compensation for exposure to toxic substances at Department of Energy facilities.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2847 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2847 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator Grassley.
